text: An ungrateful bunch of Trollz have abandoned you. moaning that they were starving. They are clearly too stupid to know what's good for them.
When starving the troll next to you can look very tasty and a bunch of your Trollz couldn't resist. A lot of Trollz will be lost but at least those left are pretty ard.

Shortly after the Dwarfs lost control of the hold, Ugma and his band of River Trolls made their home in its underground reservoir. Here they lived tormenting local adventurers and any other stupid enough to cross them, this was until Gorgal and Gorfang invaded and conquered their homes. Ugma and his tribe are determined to reclaim their home and treasure and smash in those rotten greenskins who humiliated them.
